name: Orbital Racer
description: A unique combination of space and racing sims. Choose between fast-paced, explosive action or more realistic simulation where drifting around every corner becomes more than just a gimmick - it's a necessity. Race around distinct locations such as the rings of Saturn or orbital city on Venus.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i5 - 4210H (4x 2.9 GHz) or AMD Phenom II X4 980 (4x 3.7 GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960M (4GB) or Radeon R9 M375X (4GB) Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i7 3770 (4x 3.4 GHz) or AMD FX-9370 (4x 4.4 GHz) Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660Ti (3GB) or Radeon R9 370 (4GB) Storage: 8 GB available space
